bioconda.name: bioconductor-purecn
bioconda.summary: Copy number calling and SNV classification using targeted short read sequencing

biotools.summary: This package estimates tumor purity, copy number, loss of heterozygosity (LOH), and status of single nucleotide variants (SNVs). It is designed for targeted short read sequencing data, integrating well with standard somatic variant detection pipelines and supporting for tumor samples without matching normal samples.

bioschemas.name: PureCN
bioschemas.summary: This package estimates tumor purity, copy number, loss of heterozygosity (LOH), and status of single nucleotide variants (SNVs). It is designed for targeted short read sequencing data, integrating well with standard somatic variant detection pipelines and supporting for tumor samples without matching normal samples.
